entry.content:
We want to create a sales order referencing another sales order from a different company code or sales organization.

Even if we can change the sales org after it is created, that might work for us.

entry.title: Unable to Print Terms & Conditions in Multiple Languages
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We are unable to arrange printing of Terms & Conditions (T&C) in multiple languages on Customer Invoice output forms in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. T&C text was maintained in Manage Texts / Manage Logos apps in EN, DE, and FR.

 

In the output form (Adobe form), only the EN text prints correctly. Other language versions (DE, FR) are not being picked, or when they do, the formatting is lost.

 

Expected: System should pick the T&C text in the output language of the billing document, similar to how logos are determined via Manage Logos app. All maintained languages should print correctly in customer-facing forms.

 

Actual: Only EN version prints properly. For other languages, text is either missing or formatting is broken.

 

Business Impact: Legal T&C cannot be delivered to customers in their local language, which is a compliance and customer communication issue.

 

So requesting your help to please confirm if multi-language T&C printing via Manage Texts/Manage Logos apps is supported. Provide resolution or guidance on how to correctly arrange T&C texts per language in output forms. 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: which products are linked to the SAP RISE license (cloud public and private)
entry.content: could you provide me with details on which products are linked to the SAP RISE license and included within the package? cloud public and private

entry.title: Interfaces IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION & IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT for DRC in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Objective:

To manually create eDocument for CLM invoices in eDocument Cockpit as it’s not supported, and Relevant indicator is set to false. Therefore, we want to manipulate the Relevant indicator through standard interfaces; IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION and IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT. These interfaces are provided by SAP in document- Enabling a Source Type for a Process | SAP Help Portal.

Please note that, testing is done in Customizing Demo but actual Customizing system screenshots are just for reference.

Problem:

1) Source Ext. Active checkbox is not available in SSCUI ID 102190 - Activate Source Type Documents for Company Code (pre-requisite 4).

2) Standard class CL_EDOCUMENT which is also used to generate the XML is not released (pre-requisite 1).

3) The extension classes have been created and all pre-requisites for these interfaces, but they’re not called/triggered (probably bcus of problem 1).

 

Question:

1) Is there a configuration to enable the column “Source Ext. Active”?

2) Since it’s a standard object, does this need to be released as well for the extension to work?

3) At which point will the standard process call below methods, or did we miss something?
    a) IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION~IS_RELEVANT

    b) IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT~ CHECK_RELEVANCE

 

These are all the 4 pre-requisites that are identified based on the documentation.

NOTE: Pre-requisites 1 and 4 are not met due to standard error.

1) The development objects needed to generate XML are already released except for CL_EDOCUMENT which is the standard object.

CL_EDOCUMENT in both Customizing (Actual & Demo) systems are not released yet:

But for custom extension classes for IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION & IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT they have been set to release:

NOTE: For testing purpose, we maintained both FI_INVOICE, RE_INVOICE & RE_DOC:

2) The source extension class has been implemented for the interface IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION:

3) The source process extension class has implemented for the interface IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT.

The edoc_Process is MYINV as it’s part of the Customer Invoice.

4) The combination of company code and source type have been set to Active and you've selected the Active and Source Ext. Active:

entry.title: DRC eDocument Cockpit - Message EDOCUMENT006
entry.content:
Dear All,

in App eDocument Cockpit we get error message EDOCUMENT006. Hence we can´t execute further actions ike cancle or void of existing and already transmitted documents. There so one SAP available, however this is not applicable in the Public Clodu Version.

3595486 - Ausnahme 'Fehler beim Einfügen des Datensatzes in Tabelle EDOCUMENTHISTORY' in eDocument - SAP for Me

Any idea how to solve the problem of the table oveflow in EDOCUMENTHISTORY within Public Cloud?

Many thanks,

Sebastian

entry.title: View browser tile access on launchpad
entry.content: I have an issue with the View Browser tile on the DEV environment. I have the correct business role and the appropriate catalogs along with the dependent catalogs, but I can't see the tile when I search for it. However, if I access it directly via a link, I can access it. Moreover, I have access on the test and production environments with the same roles.

entry.title: How to Create Automatic Purchase Orders Using API or OData in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-SL)
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

I am working in an SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud environment with a 3-system landscape (Development, Quality, Production). I want to automate the creation of Purchase Orders (POs) using APIs or OData services.

I am looking for guidance on:

  1. How to create automatic Purchase Orders in the Public Cloud.

  2. How to identify which API or OData service can be used to create POs.

  3. The API or OData we are extracting from CPI.

Any example, step-by-step guidance, or references to documentation would be highly appreciated.

Thank you!

entry.title: Do we have workflow for the direct supplier invoice and direct customer invoice in SAP Public cloud
entry.content: Do we have any approval workflow for direct customer invoices or direct supplier invoices in sap public cloud.

entry.title: Custom field in EPPM WBS structure
entry.content:
Dear experts,

Our client has a requirment to have a field that indicates how far along a project or a WBS is. To meet thos requirement, we have created the custom field "Project Execution".

This printscreen shows how the custom field was created.

However we are facing two issues:

1 - The first issue is that we are only being able to record values, for this field, for the WBS elements not for the project. When we try to save values for the project, after saving, the field value goes back to 0.00.

2 - The customer also wants this field to show up in a custom report that we have built. However, for the column Project Execution, its rows are being filled in with the maximum value, which is not correct.

Best regards,

Francisco Costa

entry.title: Customer Material Number for Credit Memo
entry.content:
Is there a way to view the customer material number in a table format for credit memos. For sales orders we use the Incoming Sales Order Flexible Analysis App to retrieve the information. Is there any similar app available for credit memos.

 

If the credit note is created with invoice reference we cannot use Incoming Sales Order Flexible Analysis App. Please suggest a way to find the Customer Material for Credit Memos

entry.title: PO public cloud - How can we detect delivery errors (Invalid recipient address) ?
entry.content:
Dear Expert,
We are setting up the Purchase Order Entry application of SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, so that reports can be sent to suppliers by email.
　We assign supplier's email to its contact person's address. However, when the contact person leaves the company, the email address becomes invalid and cannot be used.
If we cannot notice contact person's retirement and send a report to his email address, we won’t be aware of any Non-Delivery Receipt, because the status of Purchase Order is "Sent" and the status of Monitor Email Transmissions Application is "succeeded".
How can we detect delivery errors?

entry.title: Is BRF+ integrated with SAP Flexible Workflow for dynamic agent determination?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'd like to understand whether SAP Flexible Workflow provides a standard/configurable integration with BRF+ for dynamic agent determination based on business rules, or if the only available approach is to invoke BRF+ through an agent determination BAdI such MMPUR_WORKFLOW_AGENTS_V2?

Any guidance would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Mustafa.

entry.title: Is there any reason to purchase SAP BTP when using SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition?
entry.content:
Hello,
I have some questions about the Developer Extensibility in SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition).

  1.  I would like to create a RAP application by connecting to SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition) via ADT.
        Is it possible to create custom tables starting with prefix Z_?

       According to the following tutorial, it seems possible, but I have not been able to find an official reference:
       > https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/abap-s4hanacloud-procurement-purchasereq-shop..html

   2. If creating custom tables is possible, wouldn’t using the ABAP Environment service instance on SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) for side-by-side extensibility be considered an overdose?
      In other words, if a customer is already adopting SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition), is there a real necessity to also introduce SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform)?

I would greatly appreciate any clarification or reference documentation you could share.
Thank you very much in advance for your support and guidance.

Best regards,

entry.title: Is it possible to automate the Excel upload in Manage Sales Plans app in S4/HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello, as per the Subject - in S4/HANA Public Cloud the application Manage Sales Plans (F2512) offers the funciton to manually upload an Excel file to generate a Sales Plan within SAP; however, is there any way to automate this upload process, either through an API, or something similar, rather than doing this manually?

My client uses its own external system and requires a two-way integration with SAP, where these Sales Plans would be sent from the external system to SAP in a structured format (Excel, csv, JSON...), and also any changes in SAP would be sent back to the external system.

One of the suggestions I have already heard was using a Custom CDS, however, I am quite new to SAP S4/HANA Public Cloud and I am unfamiliar with concrete extensibility applications. How would one specificaly go about this?

Thank you very much for any answers or suggestions,
Filip

entry.title: Business Partner VAT number verification from BADI LE_SHP_DELIVERY_FINAL_CHECK
entry.content:
Hello, how would you go about the following task from an extensibility perspective?

My client, when finishing a delivery, would like to validate a VAT number of the recipient business partner. This means using the BADI LE_SHP_DELIVERY_FINAL_CHECK and calling (in this case) the european VIES registry (public API); and I assume the use of Custom Logic is necessay.

I have set up the Communication System, Arrangement, and Scenario necessary for calling the http request for the registry. A very helpful guide in this was https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_EXTENSIBILITY_EXPLORER/580e54f031eb4215b84848ac779e5f17/e8a1ffaad8f7403a95126e1b6f2e8caf.html?locale=en-US 
In Custom Logic I have created a code draft, that creates an http request and sends it to check whether the registry is online. See code below.

Now, the BADI LE_SHP_DELIVERY_FINAL_CHECK  in Custom Logic only allows me to work with DELIVERY_DOCUMENT_IN (delivery document data) and DELIVERY_DOCUMENT_ITEMS_IN (delivery document items data)... How do I access the business partner data such as the VAT number? Is there a select I can do to pull data from released CDS such as I_BUSINESSPARTNER? I have attempted such thing in the code, but the editor throws me a warning/error...
Is this even the right approach?

And a second part to this task - the client requests these calls to be logged somewhere... What would be the best way to log public http API calls such as this? Maybe through a Custom business object? I have never worked with them so far so I don't know how... Is there a better way?

Below is my entire Custom Logic code, most of which is either wrong or can be ignored:

*  Declaration of required parameters
*  DATA LS_BP_ROOT LIKE LINE OF IT_BP_ROOT.
*  DATA LS_VALIDATIONMESSAGE LIKE LINE OF MESSAGE.

* For Accessing Customer General Data
*  READ TABLE IT_BP_ROOT INTO LS_BP_ROOT WITH KEY BUSINESSPARTNER = I_CMD_BP_OBJECT_KEY-BUSINESSPARTNER BUSINESSPARTNERUUID = I_CMD_BP_OBJECT_KEY-BUSINESSPARTNERUUID.

* check if the custom fields are filled
  CHECK delivery_document_in-supplier IS NOT INITIAL.
*  CHECK ls_BP_ROOT-include-yy1_vatnumber_bus IS NOT INITIAL.

*check if communication scenario is configured properly
  CHECK cl_ble_http_client=>is_service_available( communication_scenario = 'YY1_DIC_VIES' outbound_service = 'YY1_VALIDATE_VIES_STATUS_REST' ) = abap_true.

  DATA(lo_client) = cl_ble_http_client=>create( communication_scenario = 'YY1_DIC_VIES' outbound_service = 'YY1_VALIDATE_VIES_STATUS_REST' ).


  DATA lv_vatnumber TYPE string.
* convert number field to string
* lv_vatnumber = ls_BP_ROOT-include-yy1_vatnumber_bus.


* CONCATENATE '/' ls_BP_ROOT-include-yy1_vatcountry_bus '/' lv_vatnumber INTO DATA(lv_vat).

  DATA(request) = cl_ble_http_request=>create( ).
  cl_ble_trace_writer=>write_info_message( 'request' ).
  request->set_method( 'GET' ). "->set_resource_extension( ).


  TRY .
      DATA(response) = lo_client->send( request ).
      DATA(lv_body) = response->get_body( ).
      message-messagetype = 'I'.
      message-messagetext = lv_body.
      " Response in fetched in String Format.
      " Do appropriate Split operations to fetch the relevant data
      SPLIT lv_body AT 'valid":' INTO lv_body DATA(lv_body2).
      SPLIT lv_body2 AT ',' INTO DATA(lv_valid) lv_body2.
      IF lv_valid CS 'false'.
        message-messagetype = 'E'.
*      LS_VALIDATIONMESSAGE-MSGID = 'CVI_API'.
*      LS_VALIDATIONMESSAGE-MSGNO = '010'.
        message-messagetext = 'error message here'.
*      APPEND LS_VALIDATIONMESSAGE TO CT_VALIDATIONMESSAGE.
      ELSEIF lv_valid CS 'true'.
        message-messagetype = 'I'.
        message-messagetext = lv_body.
      ENDIF.
    CATCH cx_ble_http_exception INTO DATA(lx).
  ENDTRY.


select * from I_businesspartner 
where businesspartner = @Delivery_document_in-supplier
into @DATA(temp).

message-messagetype = 'S'.
message-messagetext = temp-businesspartner.

 I am quite new to SAP and especially S/4HANA Cloud Public.

Thank you very much for your answers or suggestions,
Filip

entry.title: Real Estate Contract management: How to maintain Notes
entry.content:
Problem Statement - Want to create or update Notes for real estate contract for each node like posting term, conditions etc.

Business Scenario:  We want to build a custom utility to create or update the Memo or Notes section of real estate contract using ABAP on S4 HANA Public cloud

Expected Solution - Solution to create or edit memo/notes long text fields on real estate contract

Please let us know if there is a way in SAP CLM Cloud version where we can create or edit memo/notes.

SAP Real Estate Management SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP Sourcing and SAP Contract Lifecycle Management

entry.title: Manual release of Credit Block at PGI stage (Credit Group 03)
entry.content:
The credit limit check is imposed at the time of PGI (Credit Group - 03) , and it is working as expected. However, our client business requirement is to have the ability to manually release the credit block in exceptional cases where urgent deliveries need to be processed and business is getting impacted. However, the “Manage Documented Credit Decisions” Fiori app does not show documents blocked at PGI stage (Credit Group 03).
Requirement:
1.A process or functionality that allows an authorized user to manually release the Delivery credit block.
2.The release should bypass the automatic credit block only after approval or manual intervention.
3.The solution should be audit-compliant and restricted to authorized roles


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: "Could Not Open App" Error in SAP Mobile Start Android App
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

I have recently configured SAP Build Work Zone for SAP Mobile Start to access apps and content from SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

For the setup, I referred to the following resources:

SAP Community Blog: SAP Build Work Zone – Integrate SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud content to SAP Mobile Start

SAP Learning Journey: Setting Up SAP Build Work Zone (standard edition) and SAP Mobile Start with SAP S/4HANA

I used the OpenID Connect method to establish the trust configuration between my BTP Subaccount and Cloud Identity Service.

The issue is: When I access applications via the desktop through my Work Zone site, everything works perfectly without any issues.



However, when I try to open the same application on my Android device, I encounter the following error:




Could you please provide detailed steps or possible resolutions to troubleshoot and fix this issue ?
